Sentence: Though the final leg of our trip would take almost two weeks , we had little time at first to dwell on our impending homecoming .

The culmination of months of work by committees throughout many areas of Shetland , Hamefarin ' 85 , according to official sources , was to be a joyous homecoming of Shetland " exiles " from all over the world to celebrate the twenty-five years of prosperity since the first Hamefarin in 1960 .
Finally , I will describe the Afo-a-Kom 's second homecoming from the United States .
